title: looking for any good players or smurfs
body: yo~im a mid laner~ i need some1 who can help me to get out of bronze~  my skills are good~ I'm okay at last hitting, trading. my map awareness aint that gud, but it is not bad, so as roaming~ although at some games my roaming is really good~ at lane my skills are at bronze2- silver 5 ish level. mechanically im okay as i spam the same 4 champs. 75% of the time i win my lane, unless i play against smurfs or counters with mastery 7. if some1 feeds I dont rage, i just mute and try to focus on game. im stuck~ im not that good to carry all by myself~ i go from bronze 5 to bronze 3 and backwards.

replies.body:
To improve your skills, i'd recommend reading this post by one of our OCE instructors. 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/tBNPdREA-10-tips-to-reduce-your-death-count

It was useful even to me as a D4 player.

wow 10 tips~ that's useful. lelel but im in bronze~ none of it really matter unless im in gold or higher rank like u~ except tip 7:the wards~ they are always useful especially in bronze and silver.
1.summoner spells are totally useless in bronze ~ i have those who just randomly flash to get over the wall even if enemy is not nearby
2. ranged champs~ true i main akali for close range and play lb for a gapcloser and as well as to keep some distance if enemy is adc on mid lane~ i see tons of adc champs on mid lane
3. i also play syndra~ as she has stun~to allow my team to get kills~ sometimes when enemy team has 3 or more tanky champs~ as i know that akali and lb wont take em down in 1v1
4. bushes~ none of bronze players are gud at hiding in bush and waiting for the enemy as they dont have much patience, well except teemo~ and most of the time i can predict that enemy is waiting for me in a bush if i see them mia on my lane while im roaming.
5. gank target~ i stay in my lane if i have 0 vision on particular area of the map if i know that there are more than 2 enemies
6. i always buy boots first or when 2nd time return base and refillable potions.
7. warding true~ i should ward more as it is the most important thing in this elo~ this one i really have to follow
8. fleeing ~ yeah this one is gud idea~ unless 1 of us is at really low health ~ they wont hesitate on who to follow, but i usually try to split from the team after getting a kill~ 4v4 while im getting turrets~ and fleeing ~ wont work cuz my team doesnt have that knowledge. btw splitting doesnt work~ they manage to die fast in 4v4 and one of the enemies end up getting triple of even qudra
9. i stay away from diying turrets
10. never chase unless im akali and 1v1~ dash to minion use gunblade and kill~ then ward a jg to dash on to them to run away if im being chased
I am in a similar situation, add me in the LoL client, i'm down for a few games.
